name.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: BrowserStack Bug Capture: Report & resolve bugs faster

short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Bug reporting tool with shareable screen recordings & screenshots for faster debugging.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
𝐁𝐮𝐠 𝐫𝐞𝐩𝐨𝐫𝐭𝐢𝐧𝐠 𝐭𝐨𝐨𝐥 𝐰𝐢𝐭𝐡 𝐬𝐡𝐚𝐫𝐞𝐚𝐛𝐥𝐞 𝐬𝐜𝐫𝐞𝐞𝐧 𝐫𝐞𝐜𝐨𝐫𝐝𝐢𝐧𝐠𝐬 & 𝐬𝐜𝐫𝐞𝐞𝐧𝐬𝐡𝐨𝐭𝐬 𝐟𝐨𝐫 𝐟𝐚𝐬𝐭𝐞𝐫 𝐝𝐞𝐛𝐮𝐠𝐠𝐢𝐧𝐠.

➤ BrowserStack Bug capture makes the process of reporting bugs easy and straightforward, even for non-technical users. Create data-rich bug reports quickly, saving time & improving communication between developers and other stakeholders. Install now and unlock seamless bug reporting!

➤ 𝐖𝐡𝐲 𝐜𝐡𝐨𝐨𝐬𝐞 𝐁𝐫𝐨𝐰𝐬𝐞𝐫𝐒𝐭𝐚𝐜𝐤 𝐁𝐮𝐠 𝐜𝐚𝐩𝐭𝐮𝐫𝐞?

𝐄𝐟𝐟𝐨𝐫𝐭𝐥𝐞𝐬𝐬 𝐁𝐮𝐠 𝐑𝐞𝐩𝐨𝐫𝐭𝐢𝐧𝐠:  Simplify bug reporting by capturing screen recordings and logs with a single click, making it easy for anyone to report issues even without technical knowledge.

𝐄𝐧𝐡𝐚𝐧𝐜𝐞𝐝 𝐃𝐞𝐛𝐮𝐠𝐠𝐢𝐧𝐠: Quickly identify and resolve bugs with comprehensive insights and logs, reducing the time spent on debugging and improving overall software quality.

𝐃𝐞𝐯𝐞𝐥𝐨𝐩𝐞𝐫 & 𝐭𝐞𝐬𝐭𝐞𝐫 𝐟𝐫𝐢𝐞𝐧𝐝𝐥𝐲: Tailored for everyone, our user-friendly extension simplifies bug reporting, reducing the learning curve and streamlining your workflow.

➤ 𝐊𝐞𝐲 𝐟𝐞𝐚𝐭𝐮𝐫𝐞𝐬:

𝐕𝐢𝐝𝐞𝐨 & 𝐒𝐜𝐫𝐞𝐞𝐧𝐬𝐡𝐨𝐭 𝐂𝐚𝐩𝐭𝐮𝐫𝐞: Create bug reports by recording your screen & capturing screenshots, providing visual context for the bugs encountered.

𝐀𝐮𝐭𝐨𝐦𝐚𝐭𝐢𝐜 𝐃𝐚𝐭𝐚 𝐂𝐚𝐩𝐭𝐮𝐫𝐞: Automatically capture essential technical data, including console logs, network requests, and browser information, streamlining the debugging process.

𝐈𝐧𝐬𝐭𝐚𝐧𝐭 𝐫𝐞𝐩𝐥𝐚𝐲𝐬: Continuously record your interactions on the webpage in the background and watch the replay instantly as soon as a bug happens, allowing quicker resolution.

𝐈𝐧𝐭𝐞𝐠𝐫𝐚𝐭𝐢𝐨𝐧 𝐰𝐢𝐭𝐡 𝐏𝐫𝐨𝐣𝐞𝐜𝐭 𝐌𝐚𝐧𝐚𝐠𝐞𝐦𝐞𝐧𝐭 𝐓𝐨𝐨𝐥𝐬: The software integrates with platforms like JIRA, enabling users to create bug tickets directly from the reports, facilitating better workflow management & collaboration among teams.

➤ 𝐔𝐬𝐞𝐫 𝐛𝐞𝐧𝐞𝐟𝐢𝐭𝐬: 

𝐒𝐚𝐯𝐞 𝐓𝐢𝐦𝐞: Reduces the time spent on bug reporting by createing comprehensive bug reports in just 1-3 clicks. 

𝐃𝐚𝐭𝐚-𝐑𝐢𝐜𝐡 𝐑𝐞𝐩𝐨𝐫𝐭𝐬: The wealth of information helps you to quickly diagnose and resolve issues without needing extensive back-and-forth communication.

𝐔𝐬𝐞𝐫-𝐅𝐫𝐢𝐞𝐧𝐝𝐥𝐲 𝐈𝐧𝐭𝐞𝐫𝐟𝐚𝐜𝐞: Enjoy an intuitive and easy-to-use interface that makes bug reporting accessible to all team members, regardless of their technical expertise.

𝐈𝐦𝐩𝐫𝐨𝐯𝐞𝐝 𝐂𝐨𝐥𝐥𝐚𝐛𝐨𝐫𝐚𝐭𝐢𝐨𝐧: With integrations, streamline workflow and improves communication between support and engineering teams.

➤ 𝐓𝐨 𝐬𝐭𝐚𝐫𝐭 𝐮𝐬𝐢𝐧𝐠 𝐭𝐡𝐞 𝐞𝐱𝐭𝐞𝐧𝐬𝐢𝐨𝐧,  𝐬𝐢𝐠𝐧 𝐮𝐩 𝐰𝐢𝐭𝐡 𝐲𝐨𝐮𝐫 𝐁𝐫𝐨𝐰𝐬𝐞𝐫𝐒𝐭𝐚𝐜𝐤 𝐜𝐫𝐞𝐝𝐞𝐧𝐭𝐢𝐚𝐥𝐬. 

➤ 𝐋𝐞𝐚𝐫𝐧 𝐦𝐨𝐫𝐞 𝐚𝐭:

https://www.browserstack.com/bug-capture

Documentation: https://docs.birdeatsbug.com/latest/index.html
